Uses of Class
de.ralleytn.simple.image.Filter

    • Uses of Filter in de.ralleytn.simple.image

      Subclasses of Filter in de.ralleytn.simple.image 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AveragingGrayscaleFilter
      Grayscale filter that sets the RGB channels of a pixel to their average.
      class  BoxBlurFilter
      A box blur, (also known as a box linear filter) is a spatial domain linear filter in which each pixel in the resulting image has a value equal to the average value of its neighboring pixels in the input image.
      class  BrightnessFilter
      Filter that changes the brightness of an image.
      class  ContrastFilter
      Filter that allows you to set the contrast of an image.
      class  ConvolutionFilter
      Filter that applies a convolution matrix on an image.
      class  DecompositionGrayscaleFilter
      Grayscale filter that uses the color channel with either highest or the lowest value as the new pixel color.
      class  DesaturationGrayscaleFilter
      Grayscale filter that desaturates the image.
      class  EdgeDetectionFilter
      Filter that uses the following convolution matrix: -1.0F -1.0F -1.0F -1.0F 8.0F -1.0F -1.0F -1.0F -1.0F
      class  EmbossFilter
      Filter that uses the following convolution matrix: -2.0F -1.0F 0.0F -1.0F 1.0F 1.0F 0.0F 1.0F 2.0F
      class  GaussianBlurFilter
      Filter that blurs the image with gaussian blur.
      class  InvertAlphaFilter
      Filter that inverts the alpha channel of an image.
      class  InvertColorFilter
      Filter that inverts the red, green and blue channels of an image.
      class  LuminosityGrayscaleFilter
      Grayscale filter that mixes red, green and blue channel in specific ratios.
      class  MonochromeFilter
      Filter that only uses black and white.
      class  SharpenFilter
      Filter that uses the following convolution matrix: 0.0F -1.0F 0.0F -1.0F 5.0F -1.0F 0.0F -1.0F 0.0F
      class  SingleChannelGrayscaleFilter
      Grayscale filter that uses one of the original pixels channels as the new color.
      Methods in de.ralleytn.simple.image with parameters of type Filter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleImage SimpleImage.filter(Filter filter)
      Applies a filter to the image.
      SimpleImage SimpleImage.filter(Filter filter, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Applies a filter to the image.
